nodes.text: Lieutenant Stenberk was a male individual who served in the Danteel City Police on the planet Danteel during the Galactic Civil War. Following the death of the Devaronian noble Carisica Vanq on Danteel, Stenberk led several officers into the High Card Casino, to investigate whether a Tchine statue that had been offered as a prize in a sabacc tournament had been stolen from Vanq. However, shortly after his arrival, Stenberk received word that Vanq's Tchine had been found in a vault on her estate, and he and his party departed from the casino. Several minutes later, a camera droid recorded a confession by the casino's business manager Darim Chumu of involvement in Vanq's death, and Stenberk returned to the High Card and apprehended Chumu.
